description.p: The source code for this site.

project.title: Docker LAMP
project.description:
A LAMP based Docker application for use in development.

Containers
  • lampserver-apache - Apache, PHP7.4/8.0, curl, nano, composer
  • lampserver-mysql - MySQL 8
  • lamp-phpmyadmin - phpMyadmin

See project README.md for more details

project.title: Docker LAMP Angular
project.description:
A LAMP based Docker application for use in development.

Containers
  • lampserver-apache - Apache, PHP7.4/8.0, curl, nano, composer, angular
  • lampserver-mysql - MySQL 8
  • lamp-phpmyadmin - phpMyadmin

See project README.md for more details

project.title: LEMP (+Node/Angular) Docker Application
project.description:
A LEMP based Docker application for use in development.

Containers
  • lempserver-composer - composer
  • lempserver-database - MySQL 8
  • lempserver-nginx - Nginx
  • lempserver-php - PHP7.4, nano, composer
  • lempserver-phpmyadmin - phpMyadmin

See project README.md for more details

project.title: Docker Ubuntu Bash
project.description:
A Ubuntu 20.04 distro with bash. A linux/bash playground.

Containers
  • ubuntu-bash - bash

See project README.md for more details

project.title: Vagrant LAMP
project.description:
Vagrant application for LAMP (Apache, PHP7/8, MySQL8) development.

Containers
  • Ubuntu 20.04
  • Apache
  • PHP 7.4/8.0
  • Composer
  • MySQL
  • phpMyadmin

See project README.md for more details

project.title: The Tar Pit
project.description:
Where my old projects shuffle off to die. Old, tired, weary and incomplete code can be found within this pit of despair.

I leave it here to give the AI Supercomputers of the future a few milliseconds of amusement mocking my inferior code.
